name: Google UX Design Professional Certificate
description: Prepare for an impactful career in the fast-growing field of UX Design, where empathizing with users and crafting intuitive interactions take the front seat. This beginner-level program, professionally designed by Google, will guide you in creating wireframes and prototypes, conducting UX research, understanding user-centered design and equity-focused design, and developing an impressive portfolio with end-to-end projects.

name: Full Stack Software Developer
description: Begin your journey in the booming field of software development with this beginner-level program that teaches in-demand skills to build, deploy, and manage end-to-end cloud native applications. Get job-ready in less than four months by learning practical cloud computing knowledge, mastering front-end and back-end software development, and applying skills in hands-on labs and projects, all within this program.

name: Data Analyst Professional Certificate
description: Start your journey in the high-growth field of data analytics with this program, designed to equip you with in-demand skills like Python, Excel, and SQL in as little as 4 months. From entry-level data analytics roles to future career developments like data science and artificial intelligence, this beginner-friendly program provides essential expertise and practical experience through real-world projects, giving you the tools to gather, model, and analyze data that informs executive decision-making.

name: Cloud Application Development Foundations Specialization
description: Kickstart Your Career as a Cloud Native Developer. Learn the foundational front-end and back-end skills for developing and deploying applications on Cloud.

name: AI For Business Specialization
description: Learn the Fundamentals of AI and Machine Learning. Develop a deployment strategy for incorporating AI, ML, and Big Data into your organization that will take advantage of cutting-edge technologies

name: Data Structures and Algorithms Specialization
description: Explore the complexity and efficiency of data structures and algorithms in this intriguing program that advances your programming skills through interactive puzzles and real-world challenges. Geared towards intermediate learners, this program provides a practical approach to theoretical computer science topics, demanding the implementation of close to a 100 coding problems, equipping you for your next job interview, and beyond.

name: Information Technology (IT) and Cloud Fundamentals
description: Kickstart a new IT and Cloud Career . Master hardware, operating systems, programming, database, networking, storage, cybersecurity, and Cloud computing essentials.

name: Cybersecurity Analyst
description: Launch your career as a cybersecurity analyst. Build job-ready skills for an in-demand career in the field of cybersecurity in as little as 6 months. No prior experience required to get started.

name: Introduction to Programming with Python and Java
description: Experience the guided journey from basic Python concepts to advanced Java programming in this beginner-oriented program. Learn to write fully-functional programs, use data structures efficiently, and enhance your data visualization skills using two of the world's most popular programming languages.
